content: this crochet throw is quick to make and effortlessly adds vibrant color to your world stitched in plush bernat blanket big cel-este you ll do a series of single_crochet and chain stitches to achieve the marvelously mossy stitch pattern perfect for those who love a pop of color choose the shade that matches your decor and brighten up any room materials bernat® blanket extra thick™ big cel-este™ 21 2 oz/600 g 65 yds/59 m nebula blue 14011 4 balls or 248 yds/225 m gauge 3 5 stitches sts and 2 row = 4 10 cm in moss st pattern including single_crochet single_crochet and chain chain sts measurements approximately 42 x 51 106 5 x 129 5 cm
